text: Gentleman's Agreement is a 1947 American drama movie directed by Elia Kazan and was based on the 1947 novel of the same name by Laura Z. Hobson. It stars Gregory Peck, Dorothy McGuire, John Garfield, Celeste Holm, June Havoc, Anne Revere, Dean Stockwell and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for eight and won three Oscars in 1948. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1947 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Elia Kazan Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Gentleman's Agreement
